cause.description:
People believe that smoking is something that is inevitable, and that it's not as bad as it is portrayed, but it is actually worse than how it is described. It is really hurtful once you develop lung cancer and you can't do anything about it. Then, why should me or you expose our body and life, and everyone that loves us well-being, by smoking cigarettes?
1. Smoking DOES affect oneself.
2. Cigarettes are a synonym to poison.
3. Respect yourself and your body by not smoking.
cause.mission: To make people aware of what cigarettes can do, and urge everyone not to consume them.
cause.name: Don't Smoke
